isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - ENGINE ASSEMBLY (COMPLETE); REMOVE AND REINSTALL

step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Open hood assembly.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include disconnect ECM ground.
Remove front bumper assembly.
Disconnect hood wiring harness.
Remove hood prop rod.
Disconnect hood stop cable and hood tilt assist springs using two people.
Remove hood hinge pins, then remove hood using two people.
Remove air cleaner housing with tube attached, include disconnect IAT sensor.
Drain cooling system.
Remove charge air cooler hoses, include pipe from turbo to lower port of charge air cooler.
Disconnect power steering reservoir, include lower left radiator support strut and hood hinge bracket.
Disconnect radiator hoses and surge tank hoses as needed to remove radiator assembly, include p-clip retaining lower hose.
Remove both upper rods and right side lower radiator stay rod.
Connect lifting device to radiator assembly. Tilt assembly forward.
Remove fan clutch assembly using special tools.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines from radiator, include cap ends.
Remove radiator assembly, include remove lower radiator nut.
Remove serpentine belt.
Disconnect alternator wiring.
Remove alternator mounting bracket with belt tensioner and a/c compressor attached.
Disconnect engine wiring harness support clamps as needed.
Disconnect starter wiring. Reposition main harness out of way.
Disconnect manifold pressure sensor (MAP) and remove air intake y-pipe.
Siphon high pressure oil pump reservoir of oil, include remove/install EOT sensor.
Disconnect high pressure oil pump line from left head for access to power steering pump.
Remove power steering pump and secure out of way, includes p-clip from left head.
Disconnect water heater hose and surge tank hose from engine. Secure out of way.
Disconnect exhaust outlet pipe at turbocharger. Secure out of way.
Disconnect engine block heater wiring.
Raise front axle, support with wood blocks under tires.

note.para: Wood blocks are used to increase access for large crane.

step1.para: Remove drive shaft from behind main transmission.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines from engine.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines from front cross member.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines from bell housing, include starter cables.
Remove lower and upper flywheel inspection plates from bell housing.
Remove torque converter bolts.
Disconnect transmission wiring harness as needed to remove transmission.
Drain automatic transmission fluid.
Disconnect automatic transmission filter housing from mount bracket with lines attached, secure to trans.
Disconnect parking brake lever cable from transmission.
Disconnect gear select cable from transmission, include p-clip retaining select cable.
Disconnect oil dipstick tube from engine.
Remove oil dipstick tube.
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine EXCEPT 2.
Secure transmission jack to transmission.
Remove automatic transmission assembly, include remove remaining bolts.
Disconnect chassis wiring harness support clamp at rear of left cylinder head.
Disconnect battery to ground cable from rear of engine.
Remove front engine mount insulator bolt.
Remove rear engine mount through bolts, reposition exhaust assembly as needed.
Disconnect fuel line clamps and support bracket, include supply and return lines at filter housing.
Install lifting device to engine.
Remove complete engine assembly.
Install complete engine assembly. Install through bolt, but do not tighten.
Remove lifting device from engine.
Tighten rear engine mount engine bracket through bolts.
Tighten front engine mount insulator bolt.
Connect fuel line clamps and support bracket, include supply and return lines at filter housing.
Connect battery to ground cable to rear of engine.
Connect chassis wiring harness support clamp at rear of left head.
Install automatic transmission assembly.
Install bolts retaining transmission to engine. Remove jack.
Install oil dipstick tube to transmission.
Connect oil dipstick tube to engine.
Connect gear select cable assembly to transmission, includes p-clip retaining select cable.
Connect automatic transmission filter housing to mount bracket with lines attached, secure to transmission.
Connect parking brake lever cable to transmission if applicable.
Connect transmission wiring harness.
Install torque converter bolts.
Install lower and upper flywheel inspection plates to bell housing.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines to bell housing, include starter cables.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines to front cross member.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines to engine.
Install drive shaft. Torque to spec.
Connect engine block heater wiring.
Connect exhaust outlet pipe at turbocharger.
Connect water heater hose and surge tank hose to engine.
Install power steering pump, include p-clip and replace gasket.
Connect high pressure oil pump line to left head.
Connect starter wiring, include p-clip.
Connect manifold pressure sensor (MAP) and install air intake y-pipe.
Install alternator mounting bracket with belt tensioner and a/c compressor attached.
Connect alternator wiring.
Connect engine wiring harness support clamps as needed.
Install serpentine belt.
Install radiator assembly, include install lower radiator nut.
Install fan clutch assembly using special tools.
Disconnect lifting device from radiator assembly. Connect right side stay rod.

note.para: Do not tighten stay rod at this time

step1.para: Install power steering reservoir, include lower left radiator support strut and hood hinge bracket.

note.para: Leave lower reservoir mount bolt loose at this time. It also retains the charge air pipe.

step1.para: Tighten radiator stay rod on the right side, include tighten lower mount nut.
Install upper radiator stay rods. Tighten all stay rods.
Connect radiator hoses and surge tank hoses, include p-clip retaining lower hose.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines to radiator, include p-clip.
Lower front axle.
Install charge air cooler hoses.
Install air cleaner housing with tube attached, include connect IAT sensor.
Fill cooling system.
Fill automatic transmission fluid.
Replace engine oil, includes replace oil filter.
Connect battery to ground cable, include connect ECM ground.
Start engine.
Install complete hood Assembly and hood hinge pins.
Connect hood stop cable spring and cable using two people.

note.para: Tilt spring to outside, stop cables to the inside.

step1.para: Install hood prop rod.
Connect hood wiring harness.
Close hood assembly.
Install front bumper assembly.
Remove wheel chocks.
